title: So I bought a house...
body: <a href="http://www.nothnagle.com/402276">Check it out</a>!  My offer was accepted, I can't wait to move in!<br><img src="http://images1.e-net.com/mls/import/RochesterNY/property/full/402276_1001.jpg"><br>Notable features:<br>- <a href="http://images1.e-net.com/mls/import/RochesterNY/property/full/402276_1001.jpg">plywood windows</a><br>- <a href="http://images1.e-net.com/mls/import/RochesterNY/property/full/402276_1007.jpg">plastic covered floors</a><br>- <a href="http://images1.e-net.com/mls/import/RochesterNY/property/full/402276_1006.jpg">free garbage bags</a><br>- <a href="http://images1.e-net.com/mls/import/RochesterNY/property/full/402276_1011.jpg">blood-colored wallpaper</a><br>- only 4,584sq-ft to heat<br>- only 14 rooms to dust<br><br>I know, it sounds too good to be true! (april fools)
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-03-31

So I bought a house...
